settings.Name: chatEnabled
settings.Notes: Bubble chat automatically enabled when chat is disabled.

settings.Name: chatAnchoredPosition
settings.Description: Specifies the anchoring position of the chat
settings.Notes: 2 is for the left, 1 is for top, 0 is for bottom.

settings.Name: chatHorizontalSize
settings.Description: Adjusts the horizontal size of the chat

settings.Name: chatMessageDisplayCount
settings.Description: Limits the messages displayed in the chat

settings.Name: chatMessageDestroyDelay
settings.Description: Delays the destruction of messages, in seconds
